main event: Parties in a vehicle observed a bright 'mushball' object with multiple colors moving at high speed in an arc from east to west.
interesting points: The object was reported to be 2 to 3 times the size of a baseball.,It traveled approximately 10 miles in 3 seconds.,The object emitted light and had no noise or trail.,The sighting occurred 13 miles east of Fairview, North Dakota.,Several persons in the vehicle saw the object but could not determine its exact size.
